text: Shadow Puppets can refer to: * A synonym for shadow play * Shadow Puppets, the 2002 novel by Orson Scott Card * Shadow Puppets (film), 2007 horror film * Spike: Shadow Puppets, a comic book based on the Buffy the Vampire Slayer and Angel television series * "Shadow Puppets" (The Walking Dead: World Beyond), an episode of the first season of The Walking Dead: World Beyond ==See also== * The Last Shadow Puppets, a British rock band
title: Shadow puppets (disambiguation)
